text:
AmpMe | www.ampme.com | Montréal, Canada | ONSITE, VISA |

Put your mobile devices together and get ready to make some noise! AmpMe is the world’s most portable sound system. We’re not just any old music app; we bring people and music together. Our mobile app lets you sync and play the same music simultaneously across multiple devices.

Our team is growing! This is your opportunity to discover the beautiful city of Montréal, Canada. We're looking for:

- iOS Developer - Android Developer - Back-End Developer - Senior Data Engineer

Details here: www.ampme.com/jobs you may apply through the website or by email at jobs@ampme.com
